name: Mini Golf Battle Challenge 3D
description:
Test your skills and challenge other players in this epic and fun mini golf game!

SIMPLE, INTUITIVE, AND SUPER FUN
A golf ball and a hole, as simple as that! With easy controls, this mini golf game is super fun and addictive. Aim at the target, load your shot, and hit the ball! The simplicity of the game allows you to enjoy yourself to the fullest, testing your skills with increasingly difficult levels.

A NEW, ADRENALINE GAMEPLAY
We have made a change to the gameplay to make the game even more fun, exciting, and adrenaline-pumping. To perform a new shot, you don't have to wait for the ball to stop, you can hit it as many times and when you want! Exactly, when you want, even while it is in the air! This allowed us to add extreme and adrenaline-pumping levels to test your skills to the limit!

MANY LEVELS, IN CONTINUOUS ADDITION 
The game starts with 15 levels, but new levels will be added in future updates. Try to get 4 stars in each level, improve your skills to improve your score! Progress through more advanced courses, all the way to the top.

SINGLE PLAYER AND MULTIPLAYER (coming soon)
Play offline on many levels, or test your skills against real players around the world! Take part in tournaments with up to 5 players at the same time and show what you're made of! In tournaments, there are special arenas made to test your skills and those of your opponents to the maximum!

BEAUTIFUL, OPTIMIZED 3D GRAPHIC
Beautiful 3D graphics, lightweight, and optimized to run even on older devices. No lag, enjoy a smooth, enjoyable, and relaxing gaming experience.

DIFFERENT MOODS, DIFFERENT MODES
Are you tired and want just to relax? Just play the Easy-Normal courses. 
Want to test a bit of adrenaline? Try the Extreme and the Freestyle course.
Do you feel competitive? Challenge other players in online arenas and tournaments!


Game Features: 
- Simple, intuitive, and super fun gameplay.
- Many levels for a never-ending game. 
- Constantly updated with new content, levels, enemies, and more.
- Play single-player, offline, or multiplayer against other real players!
- Beautiful 3D graphics.
- Optimized, lag-free, to run even on older devices!

Upcoming updates:
- New courses
- Multiplayer mode 
- Shop, customized your ball


!EARLY ACCESS!
Be aware: the game is still under heavy development, you can experience bugs, glitches, and more. Follow us on our social channels to find more about upcoming updates, and to participate in pools and discussions for future updates

Hurry up and download this epic mini-golf, fun sports game: Mini Golf Battle Challenge 3D, for FREE!
Stay tuned, new updates are coming soon!
